We sell the complete line of HannesTool gouges, Robust products--my"J" rests and the Quick Core, Mirka sandpaper, OneWay products, DVD on hats and other small hat related items. Coming soon will be a jig to produce a multi bevel grind like mine. Will be doing 2 trade show floor demos, one on Coring with the Quick Core, one on grinding with my new jig and what the grind is all about and why "you" need to use a grind like this!
